short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twice wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Twice kpop background. Twice wallpaper theme for K-pop fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Cycle through various Twice Kpop wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Choose a random Twice background or select your favorite in the wallpaper customization panel.
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms for easy access.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down tasks and reminders.
7. Provides shortcuts to frequently visited websites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Add websites to your Shortcut panel for faster navigation.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes with ease.
12. Simplified sharing options for social media.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. Quick access to gaming portals.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Twice Kpop new tab.
